channel.title: Params on HG UI Navigation
channel.description: Recent content in Params on HG UI Navigation

item.title: Config Params
item.description:
Config Params

You can use the following param parameters to configure the theme in your site config.

title_sep

The title's seperator to use. Default is " â€“ ".

item.title: Frontmadder Params
item.description:
Frontmadder Params

You can use the following param parameters to configure your pages.

sort_by

A string which controls the sort, even for each section. Sorting is controled by sort partial.

item.title: Menu Params
item.description:
Menu Params

You can use the following param parameters to configure your menus. These variables should be put under the params object of the menu.

attributes

Specify the custom attributes you want to add. These attributes will be placed before the href of the link element (the a tag).

example:

menus:
  main:
    - name: test
      pageRef: /
      params:
        attributes:
          class: "active"
